greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Length of second run of 1's in binary expansion of n.
link: Michael De Vlieger, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
mathematica: Table[First[Map[Length, Rest@ DeleteCases[#, w_ /; First@ w == 0] &@ Split@ IntegerDigits[n, 2]] /. {} -> {0}], {n, 100}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Dec 23 2016 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 22 2016
ext: More terms from _Michael De Vlieger_, Dec 23 2016
